name: remasked-web
description: The source code for the remasked.com website.

scripts.dev: osascript -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "cd ~/Documents/Remasked/web && npm run dev-server "' && osascript -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "cd ~/Documents/Remasked/web && npm run dev-sass "' && osascript -e 'tell application "Terminal" to do script "cd ~/Documents/Remasked/web && npm run dev-babel "'

author: Ionel Aipatioaei
